Attacks.Name: Lick
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is given the Stun special condition.

Attacks.Name: Shadow Ball
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt.

Attacks.Name: Hex
Attacks.Effect: If the target character has a special condition, add 2 dice to the attack roll.

Attacks.Name: Venom Drench
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is given the Poison special condition. If the target character is already poisoned, causes double damage.

Superpowers.Name: Levitate
Superpowers.Effect: This character ignores terrain and other characters when moving.

Superpowers.Name: Hypnosis
Superpowers.Effect: Range 3. The target character gains the Stun special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Shadow Tag
Superpowers.Effect: Range 2. The target character cannot move or be moved by any effects until the start of its next activation.

Attacks.Name: Dark Pulse
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is given the Stagger special condition.
